Validations

required above accepted after afterOffsetOf alpha alphaNumeric array before beforeOffsetOf boolean confirmed date dateFormat different email endsWith equals in includes integer ip ipv4 ipv6 json max min notEquals notIn number object range regex required requiredIf requiredWhen requiredWithAll requiredWithAny requiredWithoutAll requiredWithoutAny same startsWith string under url

Sanitizations

escape normalizeEmail plural singular slug stripLinks stripTags toBoolean toDate toInt toNull

requiredIf

The field is checked for required validation, when expected field exists.

const rules = {
  address: 'required_if:needs_delivery'
}

// or
const rules = {
  address: [
    rule('required_if', 'needs_delivery')
  ]
}

For customized build, you can import this rule as follows.

import { requiredIf } from 'indicative/builds/validations'
